de.samdev.absgdx.framework.entities.colliosiondetection

Interface CollisionListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnimationTile, AutoTile, EmptyTile, Entity, PhysicsEntity, SimpleEntity, StaticTile, Tile

    public interface CollisionListener
    Listens to CollisionEvents in for specific CollisionGeometries

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onActiveCollide(CollisionGeometryOwner passiveCollider, CollisionGeometry myGeo, CollisionGeometry otherGeo)
      Called when this Objects collides with an other, because the position of this one was changed
      void onActiveMovementCollide(CollisionGeometryOwner passiveCollider, CollisionGeometry myGeo, CollisionGeometry otherGeo)
      Called when this Objects collides with an other in an movement because this object moved The objects end beside each other (not colliding / intersecting) because its an movement
      void onPassiveCollide(CollisionGeometryOwner activeCollider, CollisionGeometry myGeo, CollisionGeometry otherGeo)
      Called when this Objects collides with an other, because the position of the other was changed
      void onPassiveMovementCollide(CollisionGeometryOwner activeCollider, CollisionGeometry myGeo, CollisionGeometry otherGeo)
      Called when this Objects collides with an other in an movement because the other object moved The objects end beside each other (not colliding / intersecting) because its an movement

    • Method Detail

      • onActiveCollide

        void onActiveCollide(CollisionGeometryOwner passiveCollider,
                   CollisionGeometry myGeo,
                   CollisionGeometry otherGeo)
        Called when this Objects collides with an other, because the position of this one was changed
        Parameters:
        passiveCollider - the other participant
        myGeo - the geometry on this site, which collided
        otherGeo - the geometry of the other side that collided

      • onPassiveCollide

        void onPassiveCollide(CollisionGeometryOwner activeCollider,
                    CollisionGeometry myGeo,
                    CollisionGeometry otherGeo)
        Called when this Objects collides with an other, because the position of the other was changed
        Parameters:
        activeCollider - the other participant
        myGeo - the geometry on this site, which collided
        otherGeo - the geometry of the other side that collided

      • onActiveMovementCollide

        void onActiveMovementCollide(CollisionGeometryOwner passiveCollider,
                           CollisionGeometry myGeo,
                           CollisionGeometry otherGeo)
        Called when this Objects collides with an other in an movement because this object moved The objects end beside each other (not colliding / intersecting) because its an movement
        Parameters:
        passiveCollider - the other participant
        myGeo - the geometry on this site, which collided
        otherGeo - the geometry of the other side that collided

      • onPassiveMovementCollide

        void onPassiveMovementCollide(CollisionGeometryOwner activeCollider,
                            CollisionGeometry myGeo,
                            CollisionGeometry otherGeo)
        Called when this Objects collides with an other in an movement because the other object moved The objects end beside each other (not colliding / intersecting) because its an movement
        Parameters:
        activeCollider - the other participant
        myGeo - the geometry on this site, which collided
        otherGeo - the geometry of the other side that collided
